Review: This course is absolutely amazing! I learned so much and the instructor was excellent. Highly recommended for everyone.
Complete waste of time. Poor content quality and terrible delivery. Would not recommend to anyone.
It was okay. Some parts were good, others not so much. Average experience overall.
Excellent course! Very well structured and easy to follow. Great for beginners and professionals alike.
The worst MOOC I've ever taken. Outdated content and boring lectures. Save your time and money.

Not bad but nothing special. Expected more depth in the topics covered. Somewhat disappointed.
Outstanding! This course exceeded my expectations. Clear explanations and hands-on projects were fantastic.
Mediocre at best. Some useful information but poorly organized. Wouldn't take it again.
Highly recommend! Best MOOC I've ever taken. Perfect for MSMEs looking to upskill their teams.
